steps.title: Lift up the front end of a vehicle with a floor jack.

steps.title: Place jack stands under the front end of the frame to ensure stability.
steps.content: Place jack stands under the front end of the frame to ensure stability. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Empty the transmission fluid in order to prevent it from leaking.
steps.content: Empty the transmission fluid in order to prevent it from leaking.

steps.title: Dislodge the fill plug for the transmission.
steps.content: Dislodge the fill plug for the transmission.

steps.title: Prepare a container for the fluid and disengage the transmission's drain plug.
steps.content: Prepare a container for the fluid and disengage the transmission's drain plug.

steps.title: Ensure the integrity of the driveshaft assembly by creating reference marks.
steps.content: Ensure the integrity of the driveshaft assembly by creating reference marks. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Detach the mounting clips or bolts which hold the driveshaft to the transmission.
steps.content: Detach the mounting clips or bolts which hold the driveshaft to the transmission.

steps.title: Remove the driveshaft by dislodging the yoke from the transmission.
steps.content: Remove the driveshaft by dislodging the yoke from the transmission. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Prevent the jostling of the needle bearings by securing the bearing caps with tape.
steps.content: Prevent the jostling of the needle bearings by securing the bearing caps with tape.

steps.title: Stabilize the driveshaft in a vise.
steps.content: Stabilize the driveshaft in a vise.

steps.title: Remove the tape.
steps.content: Remove the tape.

steps.title: Dislodge the bearings from the yoke by detaching the retaining rings.
steps.content: Dislodge the bearings from the yoke by detaching the retaining rings.

steps.title: Use variously sized sockets along with the leverage supplied by the vise, to force the bearing caps from the yoke.
steps.content: Use variously sized sockets along with the leverage supplied by the vise, to force the bearing caps from the yoke.

steps.title: Use pliers to remove the caps as they are pushed through the assembly.
steps.content: Use pliers to remove the caps as they are pushed through the assembly.

steps.title: Flip the drive shaft around in the vise and repeat the preceding process on the other end.
steps.content: Flip the drive shaft around in the vise and repeat the preceding process on the other end.

steps.title: Dislodge the universal joint from the both the yoke and the driveshaft.
steps.content: Dislodge the universal joint from the both the yoke and the driveshaft.

steps.title: Remove all dirt and debris from the entire drive shaft assembly, assuring that it is completely clean.
steps.content: Remove all dirt and debris from the entire drive shaft assembly, assuring that it is completely clean.

steps.title: Apply a small amount of grease to the replacement caps.
steps.content: Apply a small amount of grease to the replacement caps.

steps.title: Replace the bearing cap by inserting it partially into the yoke.
steps.content: Replace the bearing cap by inserting it partially into the yoke. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Begin installing the universal joint into the cap.
steps.content: Begin installing the universal joint into the cap.

steps.title: Insert the opposing cap, partially.
steps.content: Insert the opposing cap, partially.

steps.title: Line up the universal joint and push the caps into place using a press machine.
steps.content: Line up the universal joint and push the caps into place using a press machine.

steps.title: Insert the retaining rings.
steps.content: Insert the retaining rings.

steps.title: Lift the driveshaft into position.
steps.content: Lift the driveshaft into position.

steps.title: Confirm that the yoke is properly aligned with the shaft of the transmission.
steps.content: Confirm that the yoke is properly aligned with the shaft of the transmission.

steps.title: Consult your reference lines to ensure proper reinstallation of the driveshaft.
steps.content: Consult your reference lines to ensure proper reinstallation of the driveshaft.

steps.title: Reattach the universal joint mounting clamps or clips.
steps.content: Reattach the universal joint mounting clamps or clips.

steps.title: Insert the grease fitting and apply grease.
steps.content: Insert the grease fitting and apply grease. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Inspect the universal joint to confirm proper installation.
steps.content: Inspect the universal joint to confirm proper installation.

steps.title: Remove the jack stands and lower the vehicle.
steps.content: Remove the jack stands and lower the vehicle.

steps.title: Confirm that the transmission drain plug has been reinserted and refill the transmission with fluid.
steps.content: Confirm that the transmission drain plug has been reinserted and refill the transmission with fluid. [7] X Research source
